original_title: The Pool: Shooting with Tom Bianchi
overview: Erotic photographer Tom Bianchi trains the lens of his camera on a handful of attractive and muscular male models in this posing video. The Pool: Shooting With Tom Bianchi offers insight into Bianchi's creative process as he stages a photo shoot at a swimming pool with a group of well-proportioned male models, including several bodybuilding medalists from the Amsterdam Gay Games.
title: The Pool: Shooting with Tom Bianchi
